name: ChronologicalInstanceView
description: This module displays repeating forms with action tags @INSTANCETABLE and @INSTANCETABLE_REF as children and parent records, respectively.  The table is displayed on the record home page in redcap.  If the form has a field tagged with @PRINCIPAL_DATE, this date will be used to sort the records.  If the form has one more more fields with action tag with @INSTANCESUMMARY, these fields will be used in the summary column of othe

system-settings.name: Enable Debug Logging (system-wide)(optional) Requires installation and configuration of emLogger

project-settings.name:
